Articles.Content:
Does anyone have good video recording software? Preferably free or cheap, as my budget is more or less a few dollars.

I've got the recording bit down, but I can't find a good cheap/free recording software. (Aside Movie Maker.)

About the best free one I've found is Lightworks. It has a somewhat steep learning curve, but I don't think someone who plays KSP will have too much trouble with that. From what I've seen so far, it can do probably 80-90% what Sony Vegas or Final Cut Pro can do...just not as easily.
